splash_passcodeNotSetMessage: This app requires your phone to have a passcode set up
splash_incompatibleProfileVersionAlert_m: For this Preview wallet version, you must delete your wallet data to continue.
splash_passcodeCheckFailedAlert_message: Passcode is not set up. Please update settings.
splash_rootDetection_title: It appears that your device might be rooted. To ensure the security of your Accounts and assets, using the Radix Wallet on rooted devices is not recommended. Please confirm if you wish to continue anyway at your own risk.
